questions.question_text: Which TWO of the following statements are true of bird migration?
questions.instruction: Choose TWO letters, A-E
options: A. Birds often fly further than they need to.
B. Birds traveling in family groups are safe
C. Birds flying at night need less water
D. Birds have much sharper eye-sight than humans
E. Only share birds are resistant to strong winds
